name: Empire of a Billionaire
description:
“Empire of a Billionaire” belongs to popular city-building strategy game genre with a casual twist. If you are a city building, simulation or strategy game enthusiast you can expect additional gaming fun of tap tap kind fast paced minigame as well.

Story:
Your distant relative has left you a few acres of land and an abandoned factory. Repair the factory and take charge of the operations. Begin your business with one factory and build your billion dollar business empire by growing it with best tactics. Produce various products from fruit juices to Gold jewelry to Tea, coffee plantation. Invest wisely in stocks and get more money to finance newer businesses. Build factories, manufacture products and sell them to gain profit, fulfill customer’s orders, customize your world, grow your virtual town.
Manufacture higher quality goods with right research and successful strategy and increase your reputation in market. Higher the reputation, more content to unlock and more opportunities to invest in.

Key Features:

- Become business tycoon in this city-building/ simulation/strategy type of gameplay.
- Exciting casual Minigame woven inside the game.
- Outstanding graphics and animations
- Challenging quests.
- Work out a strategy successfully to increase manufacturing productivity by managing the resources and increase the ROI
- Build recreational constructions like garden, ponds, pools and best infrastructure for your workers to be happy and more productive.
- Show your management excellence by maximizing your profits.
- Produce various goods, store them in warehouse and sell at good price.
- Seize the golden opportunities in stock market to make huge profits.
- Earn lots n lots of money and become a billionaire.
